name: Datagrid AI - Engineering Manager
full_text:
Charles Guo
 
📱 (408) 477-4771 | 📍 San Jose, CA | 📧 mycguo@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/charlesguo/ | GitHub: https://github.com/mycguo
 
AREAS OF EXPERTISE
 
**AI & Engineering Leadership**
*   **Championing AI Solutions:** Proven leader in developing and deploying AI-powered products, with expertise in LLM fine-tuning, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) applications, and AI model integration.
*   **Technical Leadership & Team Development:** Successfully managed and mentored high-performing technical teams of 12+ software and QA engineers, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
*   **SaaS & Cloud Platform Expertise:** Deep experience in designing and deploying scalable public and hybrid cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) supporting millions of devices and building cloud-native SaaS applications.
*   **Delivery Oversight & Project Management:** Adept at balancing strategic product goals with technical execution, overseeing sprint planning, prioritization, and delivery timelines for complex products from concept to launch.
*   **Hands-on Technical Acumen:** Strong coding skills in Python, Go, and Java, with a solid understanding of AI/ML frameworks (PyTorch, Amazon Bedrock) and event-driven architectures.
*   **Scalability & Robust Solutions:** Skilled in addressing complex engineering challenges, ensuring scalable, secure, and robust solutions for enterprise customers.
*   **Distributed Team Management:** Extensive experience leading distributed engineering teams across geographies and coordinating efforts across cross-functional departments.
*   **Strategic & Product Mindset:** Strategic thinker with strong business acumen, effectively balancing objectives, deliverables, and budgets to drive real results and meet customer needs.
 
**Technical Skills**
*   **AI and Machine Learning:** Claude Code, Codex, Gemini, Cursor, PyTorch, Amazon Bedrock, fast.ai, fastapi, langchain, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), LLM fine-tuning, LLM integration.
*   **Cloud Platforms & Tools:** Kubernetes, Docker, AWS EKS, CloudFront, RDS, S3, EC2, WAF, Shield, CloudWatch, DynamoDB, Azure, GCP, Kafka, Istio.
*   **On-Premises Technologies:** MinIO, MicroK8s, VMware ESXi, FedRAMP-compliant deployments.
*   **Programming Languages & Frameworks:** Python, Go, Java, TypeScript, JavaScript, Scala, Spring Boot, Node.js, Angular, React.
*   **Database & Storage:** PostgreSQL, MinIO, InfluxDB, MongoDB, SQL Server, Oracle.
*   **DevOps & CI/CD:** Spinnaker, Jenkins, Terraform, Gradle, Maven, GitHub Actions, New Relic, LaunchDarkly.
*   **Monitoring & Observability:** Humio, Grafana, Prometheus.
*   **Integration & APIs:** Swagger, REST, SOAP, gRPC, Informatica, Workato, DreamFactory, ActiveMQ.
*   **Big Data & Data Warehouse:** ClickHouse, Snowflake, Splunk (Splunk® Certified).
*   **Security & Vulnerability Management:** Coverity, Qualys, Burp Suite, Checkmarx, OWASP.
*   **Domain Knowledge:** Health Industry (EHR, payments, insurance collections), Networking Industry (SD-WAN, L2/L3 protocols), Enterprise SaaS, B2B Software.
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
 
**Professional Summary**
Engineering Manager with 15+ years of experience in technical leadership, team development, and delivery oversight, specializing in building and scaling AI-driven and SaaS products. Proven expertise in microservices, cloud-native systems, and hybrid cloud deployments for enterprise customers. Adept at driving innovative AI solutions, fostering high-performing teams, and delivering measurable results in fast-paced, high-stakes environments.
 
**Senior Engineering Manager** | Tebra, San Jose, CA | Jun 2025 – Present
*   Spearheaded the company's first **AI initiative**, developing a machine learning model using **LLM fine-tuning** to predict claim success rates, creating a potential new revenue stream and establishing the foundation for data-driven decision making for **AI-powered Electronic Health Record (EHR) solutions**.
*   Accelerated legacy code modernization by pioneering the adoption of Anthropic's Claude Code for microservice migrations, reducing typical 2-week projects to 3 days and creating reusable prompt templates for company-wide deployment, demonstrating a **bias for action** and **creativity with purpose**.
*   Eliminated critical analytics bottleneck by architecting and implementing a next-generation reporting platform using ClickHouse, enabling real-time queries and scalable data analytics across the organization.
*   Established a new team culture focused on quality and delivery timelines, transforming a regular team into a high-performing "super team" that set an example for other engineering teams, reflecting strong **team development** and **ownership mentality**.
*   Published a weekly newsletter on AI, garnering tens of thousands of views, showcasing **curiosity & learning drive** and thought leadership in AI trends.
 
**Cloud Engineering Manager** | HPE, San Jose, CA | Jun 2021 – May 2025
*   Spearheaded the development of a multi-region public cloud platform (GreenLake) for all HPE products, supporting networking, storage, and compute, demonstrating expertise in **building and scaling SaaS products**.
*   Led the deployment of cloud-native applications to on-premise environments for **enterprise customers** with stringent security requirements (e.g., government agencies), including **FedRAMP-compliant deployments**.
*   Established a unified API framework, agnostic to cloud or deployment type, leveraged by internal teams and external customers, enhancing **B2B software** integration.
*   Designed and implemented microservices architecture, re-architecting and migrating monolithic applications to a microservices structure, showcasing strong **technical leadership**.
*   Improved security posture by enforcing security standards, JWT token scope validation, and application instance validation.
*   Designed and implemented cost optimization strategies, reducing cloud infrastructure expenses by 40% through migration to ARM-based CPUs while maintaining high availability and performance.
*   Practiced agile development strategies, including planning, scoping, standup meetings, product demos, and retrospectives, ensuring effective **delivery oversight** and **project management**.
*   Built complex CI/CD pipelines using Spinnaker, Jenkins, and GitHub Actions, championing **DevOps practices**.
*   Developed an **AI assistance tool** using Amazon Bedrock, further integrating AI into product offerings.
 
**Engineering Manager, Network Performance Management** | LiveAction, Palo Alto, CA | Feb 2020 – May 2021
*   Led the implementation of core network monitoring products, including technical design, QA, code review, and release, applying in-depth knowledge of L2/L3 network protocols and SD-WAN.
*   Extended product capabilities to the cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP), creating a new revenue stream and significant growth potential for **SaaS offerings**.
*   Developed **machine learning algorithms** for predictive analytics and network security, enhancing the product's analytical capabilities and demonstrating **AI/ML integration**.
*   Designed and implemented the core framework for dashboards, alerts, and reports, improving user engagement and data accessibility with a strong **product mindset**.
*   Evaluated and implemented simple, consistent, and easy-to-use APIs using gRPC and REST API, enhancing integration and user experience.
*   Architected and designed algorithms for monitoring audio and video performance of the network, enhancing media quality and user satisfaction.
 
**Director, Customer Experience Systems** | Arlo Technologies Inc., (Spin off from Netgear) | Jul 2018 – Nov 2019
**Director/Manager, Applications** | Netgear Inc., San Jose, CA | May 2013 – Jun 2018
*   Led the integration track for a $2 million Salesforce Commerce Cloud implementation, building critical integrations with Order Management Systems, ERP, Payment Processing, and third-party logistics vendors for **enterprise SaaS**.
*   Designed and implemented new Salesforce Service Cloud, supporting critical **B2B software** applications including online ticketing, chat, and customer services.
*   Architected physical and logical server infrastructure on AWS for new corporate applications, leveraging EC2, S3, CloudFront, CloudWatch, RDS, WAF/Shield, demonstrating strong **cloud infrastructure** expertise.
*   Implemented CI/CD using Jenkins, Subversion, and GIT, increasing product quality and reducing Time to Market, showcasing effective **DevOps practices** and **delivery oversight**.
 
**System Architect/Senior Software Engineer** | Fujitsu America, Inc., San Jose, CA | Jan 2007 – Apr 2013
*   Provided **technical leadership** to team members, including interviewing, training, and mentoring new developers.
*   Selected and implemented hardware, software, platforms, and programming languages for Fujitsu's global CMS system, enhancing system efficiency and reliability.
*   Architected content publishing framework, including integration with Content Delivery Network (Akamai), enabling high availability and fast response times for end users.
